I have had more responses in my home than I ever have  in remote 
locations=
.Not only EVP's and ghost box sessions but things go missing,  one appariti=
on 
and my name being called in real time to mention a few. 
 
Diane  

 
I=
n a message dated 8/8/2011 12:33:46 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
purpleali=
engirl@... writes:

 
 
 
I get frustrated because it seems impossibl=
e to get the concept across that 
 one does not have to go to the latest ha=
unted hot spot, most of those are  
fake, and pure suggestion. The entities=
 speak with the lights on, there are 
no  portals, the spirit don't invade =
your house, you can use boxes duing 
the day.  

How much mold do you think=
 you are inhaling at these old abandoned  
buildings, what about lead paint=
, how many bums have gone over in the corner  and 
taken a dump? How 'bout =
animal crap, rat and mouse droppings? Then ya want  
to walk around in the =
dark in these places--yeah, pass! 

I do all my  recordings either in the h=
ouse, or in the garage, lights on, 
no freaking  problems, no portals, no d=
emons tugging at my bed at 
night--nothing!!!! Yet  everyone wants to belie=
ve the TV shit and think it's all scray 
demon crap.  

Most seem to have n=
o interest in real spirit communcation, they only  want 
the fear rush. Tur=
n off the lights=3D=3Dfear, go to grave yard=3Dfear, doing  
protection pra=
yers=3D=3Dfear. 

Yeah, might as well tell it to my  dogs!

F-S






--part1_5ebb7.17f881cb.3b752725_boundary
